page.title: 15STREET GAMES
page.content:
{M-I-L-K Spells Milk}
You need 2 or more people and one person has to be "on".The people who aren't "on" stand about 10 metres away from whoever is "on".The person who is "on" turns her back on the other people and shouts "M-I-L-K spells Milk",then turns round.While the person who is "on" is doing this,the other people should be running up to the person who is "on".But when she turns round,the others must stand still.If you move,you have to go back to the start.Then the game carries on until someone touches the person who is "on".Then that person is "on".The game carries "on" until everyone has had a go at being "on".
